1082,95|1060,110|1056,110|1056,110|971,110|679,134|574,140|397,111|356,111|345,103|342,102|298,110|296,111|292,111|192,137|90,122|56,156|56,194|85,197|116,197|120,201|167,206|176,197|196,197|209,210|227,212|225,217|296,217|316,197|1116,197|1136,196|1828,196|1826,190|1948,186|1953,138|1801,117|1595,117|1350,112|1318,110|1116,110|1097,96|1082,95 304-01|304|.|Letters|Orders|and|Instructions|.|December|1755|.
